name: Canva
benefits: Hundreds of free designer templates and free PDF export
description: Offers hundreds of free, designer‑made resume templates with drag‑and‑drop editing and free PDF downloads.

name: Resume.com (Indeed Resume Builder)
benefits: 100% free builder with AI writing assistance and free PDF/Word downloads
description: Simple, no‑cost builder with over 100 samples, AI writing help, and free PDF downloads.

name: ResumeBuilder.com
benefits: 30+ ATS‑friendly templates and AI suggestions; free TXT download
description: Build using AI‑powered expert guidance and ATS‑friendly templates; free users can download as plain text.

name: Zety Resume Builder
benefits: AI‑powered builder with free resume creation and unlimited .txt downloads
description: Create customized resumes with recruiter‑tested templates and smart suggestions; download for free as plain text (.txt).

name: MyPerfectResume
benefits: 40+ ATS‑friendly templates and content suggestions; free .txt download
description: AI Resume Builder with professionally written content suggestions and ATS‑optimized templates; free plain text downloads.

name: Resume Genius
benefits: AI resume builder for fast creation using templates or uploads; free builder
description: Free AI‑powered resume creation using build‑from‑scratch or upload options; allows you to draft quickly.

name: Wozber
benefits: Completely free modern builder with no registration required
description: Simple and modern resume builder requiring no signup; entirely free and easy to use with ATS‑friendly layouts.

name: Jobscan
benefits: Free resume score (limited), ATS match with job description
description: Compare your resume to job listings and get a 1‑100 score with feedback on keywords, formatting, hard & soft skills, and recruiter notes.

name: Resume Worded
benefits: Free ATS audit & relevancy analysis vs job description
description: Instant resume scoring on ATS compliance, impact, brevity, style and targeted job‑match feedback with AI‑powered suggestions.

name: SkillSyncer
benefits: Free keyword match score and resume optimizer
description: Scan your resume vs a job description to identify missing keywords, get match score, instant ATS‑friendly optimization suggestions.

name: Enhancv Resume Checker
description: AI-powered checker analyzing formatting, keyword match, grammar, structure and impact using insights from millions of resumes.

name: Resume‑Now ATS Resume Checker
benefits: Free ATS score based on 30+ professional standards
description: Upload your resume and get a free AI‑powered ATS score with feedback on formatting, keywords, completeness, grammar, word choice, and structure using 30+ criteria.
